thread.title: Huntingdon Going For 5th Win in a Row Saturday
thread.title_full: Huntingdon Going For 5th Win in a Row Saturday

title: Huntingdon Going For 5th Win in a Row Saturday
text:
Huntingdon Going For 5th Win in a Row Saturday Tools By Alabama News Network 
Story Created: Oct 21, 2015 at 5:16 PM CDT 
MONTGOMERY, AL --- The Huntingdon Hawks look to continue their hot streak after winning their last four games. 
They finally return home to Montgomery this week to face Methodist. 
Its a 1pm kick-off for the hawks as they try to keep their 30 plus points a game scoring streak alive, as well as stopping methodists tough running game. 
Coach Turk says the Hawks just need to stick to what they do best.
